name: european oak sapling
description: a small sapling with greyish-brown, smooth bark and oblong, lobed leaves
details: A small sapling standing not much taller than you with a handful of small branches. Its bark is greyish brown and smooth.  Its leaves are a deep, dark green on top and paler underneath. They are arranged alternately along the twigs, and are broadly oblong with three to six lobes.
